label: linearDimension
comment: Linear spatial dimensions of this trade product.
The linear spatial dimensions of this logistics package.
The linear spatial dimensions of this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The linear spatial dimensions of this supply chain consignment item.
The linear spatial dimensions of this supply chain packaging.

rangeIncludes.comment: A measure of spatial extent, such as length, breadth or height.

domainIncludes.comment: An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.
Any self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.
Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, of goods.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.
